item.description:
80 plus new members joined this year already. We encourage new members to come to this event and of course all members are welcome.

Join us for some pool and appetizers @ Big City in Allston from 7-10 pm. Shoot some pool and mix and mingle. It's a great way to unwind and meet new or old friends. We have reserved a small area and some pool tables for our group.  Please sign in and pay when you arrive. After pool, we can go and get some froyo @ Mixx (one of the best froyo places in town). Mixx is very close by. 

Cost: $10 total for both food and pool. 

How to get there by MBTA - take Green Line B train to Harvard Ave and walk 3 blocks to Brighton Ave. By Car - parking can be tough in this area, but you can usually find a spot on Harvard Ave or Brighton Ave.
item.how_to_find_us: 2nd floor - take a left to the pool room
item.why: Pool is fun and it's great way to meet other members.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Welcome to new members - pool nite
